item.title: SoK: Let the Privacy Games Begin! A Unified Treatment of Data Inference Privacy in Machine Learning
item.description: Our paper on the use of cryptographic-style games to model inference privacy is published in IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (Oakland): Ahmed Salem, Giovanni Cherubin, , Boris Köpf, Andrew Paverd, Anshuman Suri, Shruti Tople, and Santiago Zanella-Béguelin. SoK: Let the Privacy Games Begin! A Unified Treatment of Data Inference Privacy in Machine Learning. IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy, 2023. [Arxiv] Tired of diverse definitions of machine learning privacy risks?
